title: Invite Friends & Traders and Earn!
description: Get a percentage of the trading and success fees paid by your friends or from all the investors of the trader's service when you invite a trader to Zignaly
invite-traders-for-percent: Invite traders <0>{{value}}%</0> of all their investors' success fees
invite-friends-for-percent: Invite friends <0>{{value}}%</0> of their success fees
invite-traders-for-percent-rebate: Invite traders <0>{{value}}%</0> of all their investors' trading fees
invite-friends-for-percent-rebate: Invite friends <0>{{value}}%</0> of their trading fees
invite-for-deposit: Invite friends <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when they make a single deposit of ${{threshold}}+
invite-for-investment: Invite friends <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when they make an investment of ${{threshold}}+
invite-for-investment-long: Invite friends <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when they make an investment of ${{threshold}}+ for at least {{days}} days
invite-for-balance: Invite friends <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when their balance reaches ${{threshold}}+
invite-for-signup: Invite friends <0>{{value}} {{symbol}}</0> when they create an account
invite-friends: Invite traders <0>{{value}}%</0> of their success fees
they-get-rewards: Rewards of <0>${{value}}</0> in {{coin}} when they deposit ${{threshold}}
